original_text: After that, the Levites went in to do their work in the Tent of Meeting. They helped Aaron and his sons. The Israelites did everything with the Levites that the Lord had said to Moses about them.
korean_text: 후에 레위인이 회막에 들어가서 아론과 그의 아들들 앞에서 봉사하니라 여호와께서 레위인의 일에 대하여 모세에게 명령하게 하신 것을 따라 그와 같이 그들에게 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: After that, the Levites went in
to do their work in the Tent of Meeting
They helped Aaron and his sons
The Israelites did everything with the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 레위인들과 모든 것을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord had said to Moses about them
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 모세에게 그들에 대해 말씀하신 모든 것을
